TFileSearchWorker Class

Summary

Represents a background file searching thread which walk through all entries that come from an enumerable collection of file system entries.

Namespace: Spring.Utils.IO
Inheritance Hierarchy
TThread
  Spring.Utils.TInterfacedThread
    Spring.Utils.IO.TFileSearchWorker
Syntax
Delphi
type
 TFileSearchWorker = class(TInterfacedThread, IFileEnumeratorInspector)
 end;
